name: Hexane Finance
introduce: Hexane Finance is a multichain DeFi platform that provides a wide range of financial services in a single, convenient location. It aims to create a seamless and user-friendly DeFi experience by aggregating multiple DeFi applications under one roof. Additionally, Hexane Finance aims to play a critical role in bringing together a fragmented user base and liquidity across different chains, helping to create a more versatile and cohesive DeFi ecosystem.
